mapper.select: SELECT p.pay_num, p.pay_date, c.cate_name, f.food_name, o.order_count, o.order_num, f.food_price, p.total_price, u.id, p.method, p.pay_div FROM payment p JOIN `order` o ON p.pay_num = o.pay_num JOIN food f ON o.food_num = f.food_num JOIN category c ON f.cate_name = c.cate_name JOIN user u ON p.id = u.id ORDER BY p.pay_date DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}

SELECT p.pay_num, p.pay_date, c.cate_name, f.food_name, o.order_count, o.order_num, f.food_price, p.total_price, u.id, p.method, p.pay_div FROM payment p JOIN `order` o ON p.pay_num = o.order_num JOIN food f ON o.food_num = f.food_num JOIN category c ON f.cate_name = c.cate_name JOIN user u ON p.id = u.id WHERE p.pay_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ORDER BY p.pay_date DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM payment WHERE pay_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}

SELECT p.pay_num, p.pay_date, c.cate_name, f.food_name, o.order_count, o.order_num, f.food_price, p.total_price, u.id, p.method, p.pay_div FROM payment p JOIN `order` o ON p.pay_num = o.order_num JOIN food f ON o.food_num = f.food_num JOIN category c ON f.cate_name = c.cate_name JOIN user u ON p.id = u.id WHERE (f.food_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchTerm}, '%') OR c.cate_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchTerm}, '%') OR u.id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchTerm}, '%')) ORDER BY p.pay_date DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM payment p JOIN `order` o ON p.pay_num = o.order_num JOIN food f ON o.food_num = f.food_num JOIN category c ON f.cate_name = c.cate_name JOIN user u ON p.id = u.id WHERE (f.food_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchTerm}, '%') OR c.cate_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchTerm}, '%') OR u.id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchTerm}, '%'))

SELECT f.food_num, c.cate_name, f.food_name, SUM(o.order_count) AS total_order_count, f.food_price, SUM(p.total_price) AS total_price, p.method FROM food f JOIN category c ON f.cate_name = c.cate_name LEFT JOIN `order` o ON f.food_num = o.food_num LEFT JOIN payment p ON o.order_num = p.pay_num GROUP BY f.food_num, c.cate_name, f.food_name, f.food_price, p.method ORDER BY f.food_num LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
